original: lus dang gzugs ni rang gi sa ba yin la /
analyzed: lus dang gzugs ni rang gi sa ba yin la /
translated: the body and form are of its level.

original: mig ni de'i sa pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mig ni de'i sa pa'i 'o //
translated: The eye is of the second level.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bsam gtan dang po'i sa dag tu lta ba na rnam par shes pa dang gzugs ni de'i sa ba yin la /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bsam gtan dang po'i sa dag tu lta ba na rnam par shes pa dang gzugs ni de'i sa ba yin la /

original: lus ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i'o //
analyzed: lus ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i'o //

original: mig ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i 'o //
analyzed: mig ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa'i 'o //

analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa dag la lta ba na mig dang gzugs ni de'i sa pa yin la lus ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'o //

original: rnam par shes pa bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i'o //

original: bsam gtan dang po la sogs par skyes pa yang ba dag dang gzhan gyi mig gis bdag dang gzhan gyis pa'i gzugs rnams la lta ba la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la sogs par skyes pa yang ba dag dang gzhan gyi mig gis bdag dang gzhan gyis pa'i gzugs rnams la lta ba la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o //

original: 'di ni nges pa ste /üîΩlus la @109a * //
analyzed: 'di ni nges pa ste / lus la @109a * //

original: 'og ma'i mig ma yin //
analyzed: 'og ma'i mig ma yin //

original: lus dang mig dang gzugs rnams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i bar sa lnga po dag gi'o //üîΩmig gi rnam par shes pa ni sa gnyis pa'i yin te /

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i 'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i 'o //

analyzed: sa 'og ma pa'i ni ma yin no //

analyzed: mig gis gong ma'i gzugs ma yin /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang gong ma'i ni mig gis ma yin te /

original: gzugs ni 'di'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni 'di'o //

analyzed: lus ni gnyi ga thams cad du //

translated: The body and the eye are of this stage or of a lower stage.üîΩThe object of the consciousness of sight is of this stage or of a higher stage.üîΩThe body and the eye are of this stage or of a lower stage.

analyzed: de bzhin rna ba la yang rig par bya ste /
translated: The body and the eye are of this stage or of a lower stage.üîΩThe object of the consciousness of sight is of this stage or of a higher stage.

translated: The body and the eye are of this stage or of a lower stage.üîΩThe body and the eye are of this stage or of a lower stage.üîΩThe object of the consciousness of sight is of this stage or of a higher stage.üîΩThe body and the eye are of this stage or of a lower stage.üîΩThe body and the eye are of this stage or of a lower stage.üîΩThe object of the consciousness of sight is of this stage or of a higher stage.üîΩThe body and the eye are of this stage or of a lower stage.üîΩThe body and the eye are of this stage or of a lower stage.

analyzed: gang zhig rnam par shes pa drug po gang gis shes par bya ba yin zhe na /

analyzed: smras pa / gnyis kyis shes bya phyi rol lnga //

analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa ste /

analyzed: des na chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig rtag la /

original: lhag ma rnams mi rtag pa'o //üîΩdbang po ni du /

original: dbang byed / re zhig mig dang rna ba gnyis don bzhi bzhi la dbang byed pa ni long ba dang 'on pa gnyis ni gzugs mi mdzes pa'i phyir lus mdzes bar bya ba dang / mthong ba dang thos pa na yang ba yongs su spong ba'i phyir lus yongs su bsrung ba dang /

original: mig dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnyis mtshungs bar ldan pa dang bcas pa skyed pa dang / gzugs la lta ba dang sgra snyan pa gnyis la yang thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la'o //

original: sna dang lce dang lus ni de dang mi ldan pa dang / ma tshang ba ni gzugs mi mdzes pa'i phyir lus mdzes par bya ba dang / de dag gis kham gyi zas la yongs su spyod pa'i phyir lus yongs su bsrung ba dang / sna la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa bskyed pa dang /
analyzed: sna dang lce dang lus ni de dang mi ldan pa dang / ma tshang ba ni gzugs mi mdzes pa'i phyir lus mdzes par bya ba dang / de dag gis kham gyi zas la yongs su spyod pa'i phyir lus yongs su bsrung ba dang / sna la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams mtshungs par ldan pa dang bcas pa bskyed pa dang /
translated: The nose, tongue, and body are for the sake of beautifying the body, since it is not beautified when they are absent or incomplete, for the sake of protecting the body, since they enjoy oral food, and for the sake of generating nose consciousness and so on, along with their associates.

original: dri bsnam pa dang / ro myang ba dang / reg bya la reg pa rnams la yang thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la'o //
analyzed: dri bsnam pa dang / ro myang ba dang / reg bya la reg pa rnams la yang thun mong ma yin pa'i rgyu nyid la'o //

original: bzhi rnams gnyis dag la /
analyzed: bzhi rnams gnyis dag la /

original: pho dang / mo dang srog dang / yid kyi dbang po rnams ni don gnyis gnyis la so sor dbang byed de /
analyzed: pho dang / mo dang srog dang / yid kyi dbang po rnams ni don gnyis gnyis la so sor dbang byed de /

analyzed: re zhig pho dang / mo'i dbang po gnyis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba la dbang byed pa ni /

translated: For example, those lacking or incomplete in those faculties, such as neuters and so on, do not possess negative commitments, the heinous acts, the severance of the roots of virtue, vows, the obtainment of results,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams med do //üîΩsrog gi dbang po ris mthun par mtshams sbyor ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin pa gnyis la'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams med do // srog gi dbang po ris mthun par mtshams sbyor ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin pa gnyis la'o //

original: yid kyi dbang po ni yang srid par mtshams sbyor ba dang / dbang bsgyur ba la'o //
analyzed: yid kyi dbang po ni yang srid par mtshams sbyor ba dang / dbang bsgyur ba la'o //

original: gang yang bde ba la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga dang / gang dag dad pa la sogs pa brgyad po de dag ni /
analyzed: gang yang bde ba la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga dang / gang dag dad pa la sogs pa brgyad po de dag ni /
translated: The five faculties of sensation, such as the faculty of pleasure, and the eight beginning with the faculty of faith,

original: lnga po dag dang brgyad rnams ni //
analyzed: lnga po dag dang brgyad rnams ni //
translated: are the five and the eight.

original: kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang la //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang la //
translated: They control defilement and purification,

original: rim bzhin du dbang byed de /
analyzed: rim bzhin du dbang byed de /
translated: respectively.

original: bde ba la sogs pa lnga po rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la ste /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa lnga po rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la ste /
translated: The five beginning with the faculty of pleasure control defilement,

analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa de'i bag la nyal ba'i phyir ro //

original: dad pa la sogs pa ni rnam par byang ba la ste /
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa ni rnam par byang ba la ste /

original: de dag gis rnam par byang bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gis rnam par byang bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because purification is effected by them.üîΩOthers say that the five beginning with the faculty of faith control purification,üîΩbecause they are the roots of the wholesome.

original: gzhan dag lta ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan dag lta ba ni /
translated: The view is that the six controlling faculties

original: rang gi don @110b dang thams cad la //
analyzed: rang gi don @110b dang thams cad la //
translated: control the observation of their own and all objects.

original: dmigs par dbang byed phyir dbang drug / mig la sogs pa lnga ni rang rang gi don dmigs pa la dbang byed do //
analyzed: dmigs par dbang byed phyir dbang drug / mig la sogs pa lnga ni rang rang gi don dmigs pa la dbang byed do //
translated: The five beginning with the eye control the observation of their own objects.

original: yid ni don thams cad dmigs pa la dbang byed de /
analyzed: yid ni don thams cad dmigs pa la dbang byed de /
translated: The mental faculty controls the observation of all objects.

original: de'i phyir drug po de dag ni dbang po re re'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir drug po de dag ni dbang po re re'o //
translated: Therefore, each of the six is a controlling faculty.

original: pho mo nyid du dbang byed phyir //üîΩlus la pho dang mo'i dbang po ;
analyzed: pho mo nyid du dbang byed phyir // lus la pho dang mo'i dbang po ;
translated: The male and female faculties are controlling faculties in the production of the two sexes.

original: / lus kyi dbang po nyid la pho dang / mo'i dbang po dag tu rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: / lus kyi dbang po nyid la pho dang / mo'i dbang po dag tu rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: The male and female faculties are, respectively, the male and female sexual organs.

original: don tha dad du gyur pa ni med kyi 'ga' la ste /
analyzed: don tha dad du gyur pa ni med kyi 'ga' la ste /
translated: They are not distinct from the body faculty, but are a certain part of the body faculty.

original: lus kyi dbang po'i cha mdoms kyi phyogs gang yin pa de ni pho dang mo'i dbang po'i ming 'thob po //
analyzed: lus kyi dbang po'i cha mdoms kyi phyogs gang yin pa de ni pho dang mo'i dbang po'i ming 'thob po //
translated: The part of the body faculty that is the sexual organ is called the male or female faculty.

original: de gnyis ni rim bzhin du pho nyid dang mo nyid du dbang byed de ;
analyzed: de gnyis ni rim bzhin du pho nyid dang mo nyid du dbang byed de ;
translated: These two are controlling faculties in the production of the male and female sexes.

original: de la mo'i ngo bo ni /
analyzed: de la mo'i ngo bo ni /
translated: The nature of the female sex is

original: mo'i sha tshugs dang / nga ro dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa de lta bu'i mo la mo nyid do //üîΩpho'i ngo bo ni pho'i sha tshugs dang / nga ro dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa de lta bu'i pho la pho nyid do //
analyzed: mo'i sha tshugs dang / nga ro dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa de lta bu'i mo la mo nyid do // pho'i ngo bo ni pho'i sha tshugs dang / nga ro dang / spyod pa dang / bsam pa de lta bu'i pho la pho nyid do //
translated: the female bodily form, voice, behavior, and thoughts.üîΩThe nature of the male sex is the male bodily form, voice, behavior, and thoughts.

original: ris gnas kun nas nyon mongs nyid //üîΩrnam par byang la dbang byed phyir //
analyzed: ris gnas kun nas nyon mongs nyid // rnam par byang la dbang byed phyir //
translated: The life faculty is a controlling faculty in the abiding of sentient beings.

original: srog dang tshor dang dad la sogs //
analyzed: srog dang tshor dang dad la sogs //
translated: The five faculties of faith, etc., are controlling faculties in the purification of beings.üîΩThe five faculties of faith, vigor, mindfulness, concentration, and wisdom are controlling faculties in the purification of sentient beings.

original: dbang po dag ni lngar 'dod de //
analyzed: dbang po dag ni lngar 'dod de //
translated: The five faculties of faith, etc., are the faculties of faith, vigor, mindfulness, concentration, and wisdom.

original: srog gi dbang po ni ris mthun par gnas pa dag la dbang byed do //
analyzed: srog gi dbang po ni ris mthun par gnas pa dag la dbang byed do //
translated: The faculty of vitality exercises controlling power with regard to the continuity of a class affiliate.

original: tshor ba rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la ste /
analyzed: tshor ba rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la ste /
translated: The faculties of sensation exercise controlling power over the defilement of the realm of desire.

original: 'di ltar bde ba'i tshor ba la ni 'dod chags rgyas par 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'di ltar bde ba'i tshor ba la ni 'dod chags rgyas par 'gyur la /
translated: For, in regard to the sensation of pleasure, craving increases;

original: sdug bsngal la ni khong khro ba //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la ni khong khro ba //
translated: in regard to the sensation of displeasure, hostility;

original: sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa la ni ma rig pa'o zhes mdo las gsungs so //
analyzed: sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa la ni ma rig pa'o zhes mdo las gsungs so //
translated: and in regard to the sensation of neither pleasure nor displeasure, ignorance.

original: dad pa la sogs pa lnga rnams ni rnam par byang ba la ste /
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa lnga rnams ni rnam par byang ba la ste /
translated: The five faculties of faith, etc., exercise controlling power over purification.

original: 'di ltar de dag gis nyon mongs pa rnam par sel cing lam dag kyang 'dren par byed de /
analyzed: 'di ltar de dag gis nyon mongs pa rnam par sel cing lam dag kyang 'dren par byed de /
translated: For, by means of them, one abandons the defilements and one is led to the path.

original: de'i phyir de dag kyang dbang po re re 'dod do //üîΩmya ngan 'das sogs 'thob pa la //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag kyang dbang po re re 'dod do // mya ngan 'das sogs 'thob pa la //
translated: That is why they are considered as faculties.

original: gong nas gong du dbang byed phyir //
analyzed: gong nas gong du dbang byed phyir //
translated: The faculty of coming to know what is as yet unknown exercises controlling power with regard to the acquisition of the first stage, that of the candidate for the fruit of stream-winner.üîΩThe faculty of perfect knowledge exercises controlling power with regard to the acquisition of the fruit of stream-winner.

original: kun shes byed dang kun shes dang // de bzhin kun shes ldan dbang po //
analyzed: kun shes byed dang kun shes dang // de bzhin kun shes ldan dbang po //
translated: The faculty of the possession of perfect knowledge exercises controlling power with regard to the acquisition of the fruits of once-returner and of non-returner.

original: de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dbang po re re bstan par 'dod pa'i don to //üîΩde la kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni kun shes pa'i dbang po 'thob pa la dbang byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dbang po re re bstan par 'dod pa'i don to // de la kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni kun shes pa'i dbang po 'thob pa la dbang byed do //
translated: The word ‚Äúalso‚Äù indicates that each faculty is also the basis of the other two.üîΩThe faculty of understanding all is the dominant condition for the acquisition of the faculty of understanding.

original: kun shes pa'i dbang po ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po 'thob pa la'o //
analyzed: kun shes pa'i dbang po ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po 'thob pa la'o //
translated: The faculty of understanding is the dominant condition for the acquisition of the faculty of possession of understanding.

original: kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la ste /
analyzed: kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la ste /
translated: The faculty of possession of understanding is the dominant condition for the attainment of nirvana.

original: sems rnam par ma grol ba la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyang ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das @111a * //
analyzed: sems rnam par ma grol ba la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pa'i phyir ro // yang ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das @111a * //
translated: Because there is no nirvana for those whose minds are not liberated.üîΩWhy did the Bhagavat teach twenty-two faculties and not more or less?

original: kyis dbang po de dag nyi shu rtsa gnyis las mi mang mi nyung bar gsungs she na /üîΩgang gi phyir 'di ltar 'dod de /
analyzed: kyis dbang po de dag nyi shu rtsa gnyis las mi mang mi nyung bar gsungs she na / gang gi phyir 'di ltar 'dod de /
translated: Because he taught them in accordance with the following:

original: sems kyi rten dang de rnams dbye //
analyzed: sems kyi rten dang de rnams dbye //
translated: The basis of mind, its differentiation,

original: gnas dang kun nas nyon mongs nyid //
analyzed: gnas dang kun nas nyon mongs nyid //
translated: its abiding, its affliction,

original: tshogs dang rnam byang ji snyed do //
analyzed: tshogs dang rnam byang ji snyed do //
translated: its collection, and its purification,

original: dbang po dag kyang de snyed do //
analyzed: dbang po dag kyang de snyed do //
translated: to that extent there are faculties.

original: de la sems kyi rten ni dbang po drug ste /
analyzed: de la sems kyi rten ni dbang po drug ste /
translated: The six sense faculties are the basis of mind.

original: sems can gyi rdzas kyi gzhi yang dbang po de drug yin no //
analyzed: sems can gyi rdzas kyi gzhi yang dbang po de drug yin no //
translated: The six sense faculties are the basis of sentient beings.

original: de ni pho dang mo'i dbang po gnyis kyis pho dang mor rnam par 'byed do //
analyzed: de ni pho dang mo'i dbang po gnyis kyis pho dang mor rnam par 'byed do //
translated: The two sex faculties distinguish sentient beings as male or female.

original: srog gi dbang pos ni gnas pa la'o //
analyzed: srog gi dbang pos ni gnas pa la'o //
translated: The life faculty is the basis of duration.

original: tshor ba rnams kyis ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la'o //
analyzed: tshor ba rnams kyis ni kun nas nyon mongs pa la'o //
translated: The five feeling faculties are the basis of defilement.

original: lngas ni rnam par byang ba'i tshogs la'o //
analyzed: lngas ni rnam par byang ba'i tshogs la'o //
translated: The five faculties of faith, etc. are the basis of purification.

original: gsum gyis ni rnam par byang ba la ste /
analyzed: gsum gyis ni rnam par byang ba la ste /
translated: The three pure faculties are the basis of liberation.

original: de'i phyir dbang po rnams ni de snyed cig go //
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po rnams ni de snyed cig go //
translated: Therefore, there are just these twenty-two faculties.üîΩThe sense faculties are the basis of engagement,

original: 'jug pa'i rten dang skye ba dang // gnas dang longs par spyod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rten dang skye ba dang // gnas dang longs par spyod pa'i phyir //
translated: of birth, of abiding, and of enjoyment.

original: bcu bzhi'am de bzhin ldog pa la //
analyzed: bcu bzhi'am de bzhin ldog pa la //
translated: Or else, there are fourteen faculties,

original: dbang po rnams ni gzhan yin no //
analyzed: dbang po rnams ni gzhan yin no //
translated: or else, there are three faculties.

original: 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bye brag du rtog par 'dod pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bye brag du rtog par 'dod pa'i don to //
translated: The word ‚Äúor else‚Äù indicates that there is another interpretation.

original: yang gzhan dag na re 'jug pa'i gnas ni dbang po drug go //
analyzed: yang gzhan dag na re 'jug pa'i gnas ni dbang po drug go //
translated: According to this interpretation, the six sense faculties are the basis of engagement.

original: skye ba ni pho dang mo'i dbang po las te de las skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba ni pho dang mo'i dbang po las te de las skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Birth is from the male and female faculties, because birth is from them.

original: gnas pa ni srog gi dbang po ste /
analyzed: gnas pa ni srog gi dbang po ste /
translated: Abiding is from the life faculty,

original: des gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one abides through it.

original: longs spyod ni tshor ba ste /
analyzed: longs spyod ni tshor ba ste /
translated: Enjoyment is from the six faculties of consciousness, because one enjoys objects through them.

original: de'i phyir de dag ni dbang po bcu bzhi'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag ni dbang po bcu bzhi'o //
translated: Therefore there are fourteen faculties.

original: rnam pa de nyid kyis gzhan dag ni ldog pa la ste /
analyzed: rnam pa de nyid kyis gzhan dag ni ldog pa la ste /
translated: The other faculties are the opposite of those, in the sense of being the opposite of the above.

original: ldog pa'i gnas ni dad pa la sogs pa'o //üîΩrab tu skye ba ni kun nas shes par byed pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: ldog pa'i gnas ni dad pa la sogs pa'o // rab tu skye ba ni kun nas shes par byed pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: The basis of the opposite is the faith faculty and so on.üîΩProduction is from the faculty of producing complete knowledge.

original: gnas pa ni kun shes pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: gnas pa ni kun shes pa'i dbang po'o //

original: longs spyod pa ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste /
analyzed: longs spyod pa ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste /

original: de'i phyir dbang po rnams ni de snyed cig yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbang po rnams ni de snyed cig yin la /
translated: Therefore there are just so many faculties,

original: de dag gi go rims kyang de lta bu yin no ;
analyzed: de dag gi go rims kyang de lta bu yin no ;

analyzed: / dbang po'i don dang / de dag 'di snyed du bstan pa'i dgos pa bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of the faculties and the purpose of teaching them in that number has been explained.

original: da ni de dag re re nas mtshan nyid kyis bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni de dag re re nas mtshan nyid kyis bstan par bya ste /

analyzed: de la mig la sogs pa nas pho'i dbang po'i bar dag dang / yid ni bstan zin to //

analyzed: srog gi dbang po dang dad pa la sogs pa rnams ni ldan pa ma yin pa dang / sems las byung ba dag gi nang nas bstan par bya'o //
translated: The faculty of life force, the five beginning with faith, and the three beginning with the faculty of understanding and comprehension have yet to be explained.

original: bde ba la sogs pa dang kun shes par byed pa la sogs pa bstan dgos pas /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa dang kun shes par byed pa la sogs pa bstan dgos pas /
translated: Since the faculty of pleasure, etc., and the faculty of producing complete knowledge, etc., must be explained,

original: de brjod par bya ste /üîΩlus tshor sim pa ma yin gang //
analyzed: de brjod par bya ste / lus tshor sim pa ma yin gang //
translated: they will be discussed.

original: sdug bsngal dbang po sim pa ma yin pa //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dbang po sim pa ma yin pa //

original: zhes bya ba ni gnod par byed pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnod par byed pa ste /

original: sdug bsngal @111b ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //üîΩbde ba ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal @111b ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // bde ba ni /

analyzed: sim pa / lus kyi tshor ba sim pa ni bde ba'i dbang po'o //

original: sim pa zhes bya ba ni phan 'dogs pa ste bde ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sim pa zhes bya ba ni phan 'dogs pa ste bde ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

original: bsam gtan gsum pa'i /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa'i /
translated: In the third absorption,

original: sems kyi de ni bde ba'i dbang //
analyzed: sems kyi de ni bde ba'i dbang //
translated: mental pleasure is the faculty of pleasure.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa'i ni sems kyi tshor ba sim pa de nyid bde ba'i dbang po ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa'i ni sems kyi tshor ba sim pa de nyid bde ba'i dbang po ste /

analyzed: de na rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga med pa'i phyir lus kyi tshor ba ni med do //

original: gzhan ni de nyid bde ba ste //
analyzed: gzhan ni de nyid bde ba ste //

original: bsam gtan gsum pa las gzhan pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa'i sems kyi tshor ba sim pa de ni yid bde ba'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa las gzhan pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / bsam gtan dang po dang / gnyis pa'i sems kyi tshor ba sim pa de ni yid bde ba'i dbang po'o //

original: bsam gtan gsum pa dag na ni dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir yid bde ba'i dbang po ni med kyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa dag na ni dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir yid bde ba'i dbang po ni med kyi /

original: bde ba'i dbang po nyid de /
analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po nyid de /
translated: It is the faculty of pleasure.

original: yid kyi bde ba ni dga' ba yin pa'i phyir ro //üîΩsems kyi sim pa ma yin pa //
analyzed: yid kyi bde ba ni dga' ba yin pa'i phyir ro // sems kyi sim pa ma yin pa //

original: yid mi bde ba btang snyoms ni //
analyzed: yid mi bde ba btang snyoms ni //

original: bar ma / sim pa yang ma yin sim pa ma yin pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: bar ma / sim pa yang ma yin sim pa ma yin pa yang ma yin /

original: sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin /

original: bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba ni bar ma nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba ni bar ma nyid ces bya'o //

original: ci btang snyoms kyi dbang po de lus kyi 'am sems kyi zhe na /
analyzed: ci btang snyoms kyi dbang po de lus kyi 'am sems kyi zhe na /

original: smras pa / gnyi ga /'di ci'i phyir 'dra bar dbang po gcig tu byas she na /
analyzed: smras pa / gnyi ga /'di ci'i phyir 'dra bar dbang po gcig tu byas she na /
translated: Why are they considered similar and combined into one faculty?

original: mi rtog phyir /üîΩsems dang sems las byung ba ni phal cher rnam par rtog pa las bde ba dang sdug bsngal 'byung la /
analyzed: mi rtog phyir / sems dang sems las byung ba ni phal cher rnam par rtog pa las bde ba dang sdug bsngal 'byung la /
translated: Because they are nonconceptual.üîΩPleasure and pain arise from conceptualization of the mind and mental factors, but the body is not like that.

original: lus ni de lta ma yin yang yul gyi dbang gis dgra bcom pa la yang 'byung bas /
analyzed: lus ni de lta ma yin yang yul gyi dbang gis dgra bcom pa la yang 'byung bas /

original: de'i phyir de gnyis ni dbang po nyid du tha dad kyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir de gnyis ni dbang po nyid du tha dad kyi /
translated: Therefore, those two are separate faculties.

original: btang snyoms ni rnam par mi rtog pa nyid du rang gi ngang gis 'byung bas /
analyzed: btang snyoms ni rnam par mi rtog pa nyid du rang gi ngang gis 'byung bas /
translated: Equanimity arises naturally as nonconceptualization.

original: lus dang sems kyi dbang po gcig tu byas so //
analyzed: lus dang sems kyi dbang po gcig tu byas so //
translated: Therefore, the body and mental faculties are combined into one.

original: mthong bsgom mi slob lam la ni //
analyzed: mthong bsgom mi slob lam la ni //
translated: On the paths of seeing, meditation, and no learning,

original: dgu gsum yid dang bde ba dang // yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms dang / dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang / dbang po dgu po de dag gi ni lam gsum dag tu /
analyzed: dgu gsum yid dang bde ba dang // yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms dang / dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang / dbang po dgu po de dag gi ni lam gsum dag tu /
translated: The three faculties of producing complete knowledge, complete knowledge, and possessing complete knowledge are, respectively, the three paths of seeing, meditation, and no further learning.

original: dbang po gsum zhes bya ste /
analyzed: dbang po gsum zhes bya ste /
translated: The three faculties are called the three paths.

original: mthong ba'i lam la ni mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam la ni mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: On the path of seeing, there is the faculty producing complete knowledge of the unknown.

original: bsgom pa'i lam la ni kun shes pa'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i lam la ni kun shes pa'i dbang po'o //
translated: On the path of meditation, there is the faculty of complete knowledge.

analyzed: mi slob pa'i lam la ni kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po'o zhes bya'o //
translated: On the path of no further learning, there is the faculty possessing complete knowledge.

original: rang gi ngo bo bstan nas /üîΩdbang po rnams las zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du /üîΩzag pa med @112a * //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo bstan nas / dbang po rnams las zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du / zag pa med @112a * //

analyzed: pa rnams ni du zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnam pa'i dbye ba brjod par bya ste /
translated: the classification of faculties should be mentioned.üîΩHow many are contaminated and how many are uncontaminated?üîΩThe three just explained, the faculty producing complete knowledge and so on,

original: de la re zhig kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa bshad ma thag pa de dag / gsum ni dri ma med /
analyzed: de la re zhig kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa bshad ma thag pa de dag / gsum ni dri ma med /
translated: are stainless amala.

original: zag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: zag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: They are uncontaminated anƒÅsrava.

analyzed: dri ma rnams ni zag pa'i rnam grangs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The defilements are synonyms of fluxes.

original: gzugs can srog dang sdug bsngal dag / zag bcas gzugs can gyi dbang po bdun dang / srog gis dbang po dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde pa rnams ni gcig tu zag pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs can srog dang sdug bsngal dag / zag bcas gzugs can gyi dbang po bdun dang / srog gis dbang po dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde pa rnams ni gcig tu zag pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The seven material faculties, the vitality faculty, the faculties of suffering and dissatisfaction are solely impure.

original: gzugs can zhes bya ba ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / pho dang / mo'i dbang po dang bdun te /
analyzed: gzugs can zhes bya ba ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / pho dang / mo'i dbang po dang bdun te /

original: gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung pos bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are called material because they are included in the aggregate of form.

original: dgu rnam gnyis /üîΩyid dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms dang / dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang / dbang po dgu po de dag ni /
analyzed: dgu rnam gnyis / yid dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms dang / dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang / dbang po dgu po de dag ni /

analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa yang yin zag pa med pa yang yin no //

analyzed: dbang po rnams las rnam par smin pa ni du /

analyzed: rnam par smin pa ma yin pa ni du zhig ce na /

original: srog ni / rnam smin /
analyzed: srog ni / rnam smin /

analyzed: srog gi dbang po ni gcig tu rnam par smin pa'o //

original: bcu gnyis rnam pa gnyis /
analyzed: bcu gnyis rnam pa gnyis /

original: bcu gnyis gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gnyis gang zhe na /

original: tha ma'i brgyad dang yid mi bde //
analyzed: tha ma'i brgyad dang yid mi bde //
translated: The last eight, the mental faculty, and dissatisfaction.

original: rnam pa ma gtogs pa ste ;
analyzed: rnam pa ma gtogs pa ste ;
translated: With the exception of their modes.

original: dad pa la sogs pa tha ma brgyad dang / yid mi bde ba dang / srog gi dbang po ma gtogs pa /
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa tha ma brgyad dang / yid mi bde ba dang / srog gi dbang po ma gtogs pa /
translated: The last eight faculties, i.e., faith, etc., the mental faculty and the faculty of dissatisfaction, with the exception of their modes, are either a ripened effect or not a ripened effect.

analyzed: gzhan bcu gnyis ni rnam par smin pa yang yin / rnam par smin pa ma yin pa yang yin te /
translated: The other twelve are of two types.

original: de la mig la sogs pa bdun rgyas pa las byung ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa ma yin no //üîΩlhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: de la mig la sogs pa bdun rgyas pa las byung ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa ma yin no // lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'o //
translated: The seven material faculties, i.e., the five sense faculties and the two sexual faculties, are not a ripened effect when they are an effect of accumulation; they are a ripened effect when they are an effect of retribution.

original: yid dang sdug bsngal dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams ni dge pa dang / nyon mongs pa can dang / spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas pa dang / sprul pa rnams ni ci rigs par rnam par smin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yid dang sdug bsngal dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams ni dge pa dang / nyon mongs pa can dang / spyod lam pa dang / bzo'i gnas pa dang / sprul pa rnams ni ci rigs par rnam par smin pa ma yin no //
translated: The mental faculty, the faculty of sensation of pleasure, the faculty of satisfaction, the faculty of dissatisfaction and the faculty of equanimity are not a ripened effect when they are good, defiled, or a state of composure; they are a ripened effect when they are nondefined.üîΩThe faculty of coming to know what is as yet unknown, etc., are not a ripened effect because they are not the effect of action.

original: lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa'o //

analyzed: mig la sogs pa bcu gnyis dang / srog gi dbang po ma gtogs pa lhag ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa ma yin par grub bo // dbang po rnams la rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du /
translated: The twelve faculties, i.e., the five sense faculties and the seven mental faculties, are not necessarily results of retribution.üîΩHow many faculties are results of retribution?

original: rnam par smin pa med pa rnams ni du zhig ce na /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa med pa rnams ni du zhig ce na /
translated: How many are not results of retribution?

original: bshad ma thag pa'i yid mi bde ba gang yin pa @112b dang / de gcig ni /üîΩrnam par smin bcas /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i yid mi bde ba gang yin pa @112b dang / de gcig ni / rnam par smin bcas /
translated: The mental faculty, which has just been mentioned, is a result of retribution.üîΩOne is a result of retribution.

original: gcig bo de ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa nyid do //üîΩni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nyid ces bya ba dang / rim pa gzhan du sbyar bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gcig bo de ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa nyid do // ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nyid ces bya ba dang / rim pa gzhan du sbyar bar rig par bya'o //
translated: The mental faculty is a result of retribution.üîΩThe word eva, ‚Äúonly,‚Äù is to be supplied.

original: de ni lung du ma bstan pa yang med la /üîΩmnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ni lung du ma bstan pa yang med la / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: It is not non-defined, because it is not possible for a result of retribution to be non-defined.

original: zag pa med pa yang med de /
analyzed: zag pa med pa yang med de /
translated: It is not pure, because it is not possible for a result of retribution to be pure.

original: de'i phyir yid mi bde ba la ni rnam par smin pa med pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir yid mi bde ba la ni rnam par smin pa med pa med do //
translated: Therefore, the mental faculty is necessarily a result of retribution.

original: bcu rnams gnyis /
analyzed: bcu rnams gnyis /
translated: Two are of two types.

original: rnam par smin pa yang yin rnam par smin pa med pa yang yin no //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa yang yin rnam par smin pa med pa yang yin no //
translated: They are also the ripened effect and also not the ripened effect.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: Which ten?

original: yid dang tshor gzhan dad la sogs //
analyzed: yid dang tshor gzhan dad la sogs //
translated: The mental faculty, the other sensations, faith and so on.

original: tshor ba gzhan zhes smos pas ni yid mi bde ba las gzhan pa'i tshor ba dang / dad pa la sogs pa dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab rnams gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: tshor ba gzhan zhes smos pas ni yid mi bde ba las gzhan pa'i tshor ba dang / dad pa la sogs pa dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab rnams gzung bar bya ste /

original: de la yid dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms ni mi dge ba dang / dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: de la yid dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms ni mi dge ba dang / dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Among them, the mental faculty, pleasure, mental pleasure and equanimity are associated with the ripened effect when they are nonvirtuous or virtuous contaminated states.

original: zag pa med pa dang lud du ma bstan pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: zag pa med pa dang lud du ma bstan pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa med pa yin no //
translated: They are not associated with the ripened effect when they are uncontaminated or unobscured neutral states.

original: sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The faculty of pain is associated with the ripened effect when it is virtuous or nonvirtuous.

original: lung du ma bstan pa ni rnam par smin pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa ni rnam par smin pa med pa yin no //
translated: It is not associated with the ripened effect when it is neutral.

original: dad pa la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Faith and the other faculties that are impure are with ripening.

original: zag pa med pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: zag pa med pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa med pa yin no //
translated: Those that are pure are without ripening.

original: gzhan dag ni rnam par smin pa med par grub bo //üîΩdge ba rnams ni du /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni rnam par smin pa med par grub bo // dge ba rnams ni du /
translated: The other faculties are established as being without ripening.üîΩHow many are wholesome?

original: mi dge ba rnams ni du /
analyzed: mi dge ba rnams ni du /
translated: How many are unwholesome?

original: lung du ma bstan pa rnams ni du zhig ce na /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa rnams ni du zhig ce na /
translated: How many are indeterminate?

original: re zhig dge ba brgyad /
analyzed: re zhig dge ba brgyad /

analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa gsum ni gcig tu dge ba'o //

original: yid mi bde ba ni rnam pa gnyis /
analyzed: yid mi bde ba ni rnam pa gnyis /

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba'o //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba'o //

original: yid dang tshor gzhan ni /
analyzed: yid dang tshor gzhan ni /

analyzed: rnam gsum / dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa rnams so //

analyzed: gzhan ni rnam pa gcig /

original: gzhan zhes bya ba de gang zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba de gang zhe na /

analyzed: mig la sogs pa dang / brgyad pa srog dang / de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa nyid do //

original: dbang po 'di rnams las /
analyzed: dbang po 'di rnams las /
translated: Among these faculties,

original: dbang po gang dag khams gang du gtogs she na /

analyzed: btang snyoms srog dang yid dang dge / btang snyoms dang / srog dang / yid dang / dad pa la sogs pa dang ngo // yang gang zhig dbang po nang na mang po dang ldan na /
translated: The controlling faculties of equanimity, life, mind, and the five moral faculties.

original: de du zhig dang zhe na /
analyzed: de du zhig dang zhe na /
translated: What is the maximum number of controlling faculties in the realm of immateriality?

original: mang por ldan na bcu dgu ste //
analyzed: mang por ldan na bcu dgu ste //
translated: The maximum number is nineteen.

original: dri ma med rnams ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: dri ma med rnams ma gtogs pa'o //
translated: Excluding the stainless ones.

original: dri ma med pa gsum ma gtogs pa ste /
analyzed: dri ma med pa gsum ma gtogs pa ste /
translated: The maximum number of controlling faculties in the realm of immateriality is nineteen, excluding the three stainless controlling faculties.

original: de yang / mtshan gnyis /
analyzed: de yang / mtshan gnyis /
translated: The two sexual faculties are absent there, for the same reasons given above.

original: mtshan gnyis pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par chad pa ma yin pa dbang po tshogs pa zhig yin na ni bcu dgu dang ldan no //
analyzed: mtshan gnyis pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par chad pa ma yin pa dbang po tshogs pa zhig yin na ni bcu dgu dang ldan no //
translated: If he is not a hermaphrodite and has not cut off the wholesome roots, he is endowed with nineteen controlling faculties.

original: gzhan yang gang zhig ce na /
analyzed: gzhan yang gang zhig ce na /
translated: What is the other case?

original: 'phags pa chags bcas ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa chags bcas ni /
translated: The noble one who is not detached

original: slob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba yang nang na mang na bcu dgu dang ldan te /
analyzed: slob pa 'dod chags dang ma bral ba yang nang na mang na bcu dgu dang ldan te /
translated: The noble one who is not detached from the realm of desire can possess at the most nineteen controlling faculties.

original: mtshan gcig dri med gnyis ma gtogs //üîΩmtshan gcig dang / zag pa med pa gnyis te /
analyzed: mtshan gcig dri med gnyis ma gtogs // mtshan gcig dang / zag pa med pa gnyis te /
translated: Excluding the two sexual faculties and the immaculate faculties.

original: kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig ma gtogs so //
analyzed: kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang gnyis las gang yang rung ba zhig ma gtogs so //
translated: Excluding one of the two sexual faculties and excluding one of the two immaculate controlling faculties, i.e., the faculty of coming to know what is as yet unknown or the faculty of perfect knowledge.

original: khams rab tu dbye ba'i zhar la 'ongs pa'i dbang po rnams kyi bar du dbye ba rgya cher bshad zin to //
analyzed: khams rab tu dbye ba'i zhar la 'ongs pa'i dbang po rnams kyi bar du dbye ba rgya cher bshad zin to //
translated: We have explained the controlling faculties in the section devoted to the aggregates, sense spheres and elements.

original: da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste //üîΩci 'dus byas kyi chos 'di dag ji ltar mtshan nyid tha dad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: da ni 'di dpyad par bya ste // ci 'dus byas kyi chos 'di dag ji ltar mtshan nyid tha dad pa bzhin no //
translated: Now we must examine the following point.

original: skye ba yang tha dad dam /
analyzed: skye ba yang tha dad dam /
translated: Are the conditioned factors, i.e., the aggregates, sense spheres and elements, produced in the same way as they are enumerated?üîΩOr else, is there a single factor that is produced by all the controlling faculties?

original: 'on te 'ga' zhig nges par lhan cig skye ba'ang yod ce na /
analyzed: 'on te 'ga' zhig nges par lhan cig skye ba'ang yod ce na /
translated: But is there any that is definitely co-arisen?

original: smras pa / yod de /
analyzed: smras pa / yod de /
translated: There is,

original: chos 'di dag thams cad ni gzugs dang / sems dang sems las byung ba dang // sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas dang rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos 'di dag thams cad ni gzugs dang / sems dang sems las byung ba dang // sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas dang rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro //
translated: for all these factors are of five kinds: form, mind, mental factors, factors not associated with mind, and unconditioned factors.

original: de la 'dus ma byas la ni skye ba med do //
analyzed: de la 'dus ma byas la ni skye ba med do //
translated: Among them, the unconditioned factors have no arising.

original: gzugs can gyi chos rnams kyi nges pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: gzugs can gyi chos rnams kyi nges pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The determination of the factors with form is as follows:

original: 'dod pa'i dbang po med pa dang // sgra med rdul phran rdzas brgyad do //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dbang po med pa dang // sgra med rdul phran rdzas brgyad do //
translated: In the desire realm, a particle without faculties or sound is eight substances.

original: bsags pa'i gzugs kyi nang na phra ba ni rdul phran zhes bya ste /
analyzed: bsags pa'i gzugs kyi nang na phra ba ni rdul phran zhes bya ste /
translated: The most subtle of the accumulated forms is called a particle.

original: de bas chung ba ni mi mngon no //
analyzed: de bas chung ba ni mi mngon no //
translated: There is no smaller form than that.

original: de yang dbang po yang med sgra yang med pa zhig yin na ni 'dod pa'i khams dag tu rdzas brgyad dang ldan par skye ste /
analyzed: de yang dbang po yang med sgra yang med pa zhig yin na ni 'dod pa'i khams dag tu rdzas brgyad dang ldan par skye ste /
translated: If it is without faculties and without sound, it arises in the desire realm with eight substances,

original: gang yang rung ba zhig med par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba zhig med par ni ma yin no //
translated: but not without any of them.

original: brgyad ni @116b 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa gzugs dang / dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang bzhi'o //
analyzed: brgyad ni @116b 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa gzugs dang / dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang bzhi'o //
translated: The eight substances are the four fundamental material elements and the four derived material elements: visible form, odor, taste, and tangible.

original: gal te rdul phra rab sgra med la dbang po dang bcas pa zhig yin na ni rdzas dgu'am bcu dang ldan par skye ste /
analyzed: gal te rdul phra rab sgra med la dbang po dang bcas pa zhig yin na ni rdzas dgu'am bcu dang ldan par skye ste /
translated: If the subtle particle is without sound and possesses the faculty, it is produced with nine or ten substances.

original: de la re zhig / rdzas dgu lus kyi dbang ldan la //
analyzed: de la re zhig / rdzas dgu lus kyi dbang ldan la //
translated: Nine substances are in the subtle particle that possesses the body faculty.

original: lus kyi dbang po 'di la yod pas de ni lus kyi dbang ldan zhes bya ste /
analyzed: lus kyi dbang po 'di la yod pas de ni lus kyi dbang ldan zhes bya ste /
translated: It is called ‚Äúthat which possesses the body faculty‚Äù because this body faculty exists in it.

original: de la rdzas dgu ni brgyad po de dag dang lus kyi dbang po'o //
analyzed: de la rdzas dgu ni brgyad po de dag dang lus kyi dbang po'o //
translated: The nine substances are the eight substances mentioned above plus the body faculty.

original: rdzas bcu dbang po gzhan zhig na dbang po gzhan rdul phra mo gang la yod pa de la rdzas bcu ste /
analyzed: rdzas bcu dbang po gzhan zhig na dbang po gzhan rdul phra mo gang la yod pa de la rdzas bcu ste /
translated: Ten substances are in the subtle particle that possesses another faculty.

original: dgu po de dag nyid dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce'i dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig go //
analyzed: dgu po de dag nyid dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce'i dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig go //
translated: The ten substances are the nine substances mentioned above plus one of the faculties of eye, ear, nose, or tongue.

original: yang rdul phra mo de dag sgra dang bcas pa zhig tu skye na ni go rims bzhin du rdzas dgu 'am bcu 'am bcu gcig dang ldan par skye ban skye'o //
analyzed: yang rdul phra mo de dag sgra dang bcas pa zhig tu skye na ni go rims bzhin du rdzas dgu 'am bcu 'am bcu gcig dang ldan par skye ban skye'o //
translated: If these subtle particles arise with sound, they arise with nine, ten, or eleven substances, respectively.

original: gzugs kyi khams dag na ni dri dang / ro gnyis med par bshad pas des na de pa'i rdul phra mo dag rdzas drug gam bdun nam brgyad dang ldan par zhes bshad zin pas yang mi brjod de //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams dag na ni dri dang / ro gnyis med par bshad pas des na de pa'i rdul phra mo dag rdzas drug gam bdun nam brgyad dang ldan par zhes bshad zin pas yang mi brjod de //
translated: In the realm of form, smell and taste do not exist. Therefore, the subtle particles there are explained as possessing six, seven, or eight substances.

original: gzugs can rnams kyi nges pa lhan cig skyes pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzugs can rnams kyi nges pa lhan cig skyes pa bshad zin to //
translated: The determination of the physical has been explained.

original: lhag ma rnams brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: lhag ma rnams brjod par bya ste /
translated: The rest will be explained.

original: de la re zhig / sems dang sems byung lhan cig nges //
analyzed: de la re zhig / sems dang sems byung lhan cig nges //
translated: Mind and mental factors are definitely simultaneous.

original: 'di dag ni phan tshun med na skye bar mi nus so //
analyzed: 'di dag ni phan tshun med na skye bar mi nus so //
translated: They are not able to arise without each other.

original: thams cad 'dus byas mtshan nyid dang // nges par lhan cig ces bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: thams cad 'dus byas mtshan nyid dang // nges par lhan cig ces bya bar sbyar te /
translated: All conditioned phenomena and their characteristics are definitely simultaneous.

original: gang gzugs dang / sems dang sems las byung ba dang / mi ldan pa cung zad cig skye ba de thams cad ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dang lhan cig skye'o //
analyzed: gang gzugs dang / sems dang sems las byung ba dang / mi ldan pa cung zad cig skye ba de thams cad ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dang lhan cig skye'o //
translated: Whatever is produced, whether form, thought, thoughtconcomitants or non-informative action, is produced together with the characteristics of the conditioned.

original: thob pa'am thob pa ni sems can du ston pa 'ba' zhig dang lhan cig skye'o //
analyzed: thob pa'am thob pa ni sems can du ston pa 'ba' zhig dang lhan cig skye'o //
translated: Obtainment or possession is produced only in accompaniment of that which is declared to be sentient.

original: gzhan dang ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dang ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not produced in accompaniment of other factors.

original: 'am zhes bya ba ni bye brag tu gtogs pa'i don to //
analyzed: 'am zhes bya ba ni bye brag tu gtogs pa'i don to //
translated: Or indicates that the possession of the other factors should be distinguished.

original: sems las 'byung ba zhes brjod pa la /
analyzed: sems las 'byung ba zhes brjod pa la /
translated: The thoughtconcomitants are mentioned.

original: sems las byung ba zhes bya ba de dag gang zhig ce na /
analyzed: sems las byung ba zhes bya ba de dag gang zhig ce na /
translated: What are the thoughtconcomitants?

original: sems byung rnam pa lnga /
analyzed: sems byung rnam pa lnga /
translated: Five classes of thoughtconcomitants.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: What are these five classes?

original: sa mang la sogs tha dad phyir //
analyzed: sa mang la sogs tha dad phyir //
translated: Because of the difference of the general, etc.

original: sems las byung ba ni sa mang po pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i sa mang po pa rnams dang / dge ba'i sa mang po pa rnams dang / nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa rnams dang / nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i sa mang po pa rnams dang rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: sems las byung ba ni sa mang po pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i sa mang po pa rnams dang / dge ba'i sa mang po pa rnams dang / nyon mongs pa'i sa mang po pa rnams dang / nyon mongs pa chung ngu'i sa mang po pa rnams dang rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: Mental factors are of five kinds: universal mental factors, particular wholesome mental factors, particular afflictive mental factors, particular primary afflictions, and particular secondary afflictions.

original: sa zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i gnas te /üîΩgang zhig gang gi skye ba'i @117a * //üîΩgnas yin pa de ni de'i sems las byung bas sa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sa zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i gnas te / gang zhig gang gi skye ba'i @117a * // gnas yin pa de ni de'i sems las byung bas sa zhes bya'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúground‚Äù means a basis of arising.üîΩThat which is the basis of arising for a given mental factor is its ground.

original: de la 'di dag ni sa mang po yin pas sa mang po pa rnams te /
analyzed: de la 'di dag ni sa mang po yin pas sa mang po pa rnams te /
translated: The universal mental factors are so called because they are present on all grounds.

original: sems can thams cad las byung ba gang yin pa rnams so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad las byung ba gang yin pa rnams so //
translated: They are present in all sentient beings.

original: gang dag sems can thams cad las 'byung ba de dag kyang gang zhig ce na /
analyzed: gang dag sems can thams cad las 'byung ba de dag kyang gang zhig ce na /
translated: What are the mental factors that are present in all sentient beings?üîΩFeeling, impulse, conception,

original: tshor dang sems pa 'du shes dang // 'dun dang rig dang blo gros dran //
analyzed: tshor dang sems pa 'du shes dang // 'dun dang rig dang blo gros dran //
translated: Desire, contact, discernment, memory,

original: yid la byed dang mos pa dang // ting nge 'dzin sems thams cad la //
analyzed: yid la byed dang mos pa dang // ting nge 'dzin sems thams cad la //
translated: Attention, resolve, and concentration are present in all minds.

original: chos bcu po 'di dag ni skad cig cing sems can thams cad la tshor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos bcu po 'di dag ni skad cig cing sems can thams cad la tshor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: These ten dharmas are momentary and are experienced by all sentient beings.

original: de la tshor ba ni myong ba rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de la tshor ba ni myong ba rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Among them, feeling is the experience of the three kinds:

original: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'o //
translated: pleasant, unpleasant, and neither pleasant nor unpleasant.

original: sems pa ni sems mngon par 'du byed pa'o //
analyzed: sems pa ni sems mngon par 'du byed pa'o //
translated: Volition is the mental factor that directs the mind.

original: 'du shes ni 'dus nas shes pa ste yul la mtshan mar 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'dus nas shes pa ste yul la mtshan mar 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Perception is the cognition of what is combined, which grasps the characteristics of objects.

original: 'dun pa ni byed 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pa ni byed 'dod pa'o //
translated: Desire is the wish to act.

original: reg pa ni yul dang / dbang po dang rnam par shes pa 'dus pa las skyes pa ni reg pa'o //
analyzed: reg pa ni yul dang / dbang po dang rnam par shes pa 'dus pa las skyes pa ni reg pa'o //
translated: Contact is what arises from the combination of object, sense faculty, and consciousness.

original: blo gros ni shes rab ste /
analyzed: blo gros ni shes rab ste /
translated: Intellect is wisdom.

original: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'o //
translated: It is the thorough differentiation of phenomena.

original: dran pa ni dmigs pa mi brjed pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa ni dmigs pa mi brjed pa'o //
translated: Recollection is not forgetting the object.

original: yid la byed pa ni sems kyi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: yid la byed pa ni sems kyi 'jug pa'o //
translated: Attention is the engagement of the mind.

original: mos pa ni mos par byed pa'o //
analyzed: mos pa ni mos par byed pa'o //
translated: Resolve is what makes one resolute.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni sems rtse gcig pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni sems rtse gcig pa'o //
translated: Concentration is the one-pointedness of the mind.

original: sems dang sems las byung ba'i byed ga ni phra bas de ni re zhig 'di ltar rgyun rnams la yang yongs su gcad par dka' na skad cig ma lta bu la smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba'i byed ga ni phra bas de ni re zhig 'di ltar rgyun rnams la yang yongs su gcad par dka' na skad cig ma lta bu la smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: Since the activity of mind and mental factors is subtle, it is difficult to discern even in a continuum, let alone in a moment.

original: gzugs can rnams la yang re zhig dbang po'i gzung ba sman la sogs pa ro mang po dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig la yang ro'i bye brag nges par gzung bar dka' na gang zag gzugs can ma yin pa'i chos blos gzung ba rnams la lta smos kyang ci
analyzed: gzugs can rnams la yang re zhig dbang po'i gzung ba sman la sogs pa ro mang po dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig la yang ro'i bye brag nges par gzung bar dka' na gang zag gzugs can ma yin pa'i chos blos gzung ba rnams la lta smos kyang ci
translated: It is difficult to discern the specific taste of medicine that has many tastes when it is grasped by a sense faculty, let alone when it is grasped by the mind that is not physical.

original: dgos / sa mang po pa rnams bshad zin to //üîΩdge ba'i sa mang po pa'i skabs yin pas /
analyzed: dgos / sa mang po pa rnams bshad zin to // dge ba'i sa mang po pa'i skabs yin pas /
translated: The universal mental states have been explained.

original: dad dang bag yod shin tu sbyangs //
analyzed: dad dang bag yod shin tu sbyangs //
translated: Faith, vigilance, equanimity,

original: btang snyoms ngo tsha shes khrel yod //
analyzed: btang snyoms ngo tsha shes khrel yod //
translated: conscientiousness, shame, embarrassment,

original: rtsa ba gnyis rnam mi 'tshe dang // brtson 'grus rtag tu dge ba la'o //
analyzed: rtsa ba gnyis rnam mi 'tshe dang // brtson 'grus rtag tu dge ba la'o //
translated: nonviolence, and effort are always virtuous.

original: chos 'di dag ni dge ba'i sems las byung bas /
analyzed: chos 'di dag ni dge ba'i sems las byung bas /
translated: These phenomena arise from virtuous minds.

original: de'i phyir dge ba'i sa mang po pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir dge ba'i sa mang po pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Therefore, they are called the ‚Äúgreat ground of virtue.‚Äù

original: de la dad pa ni sems dang ba'o //
analyzed: de la dad pa ni sems dang ba'o //
translated: Faith is the clarity of mind.

original: bag yod pa ni dge pa'am sa rnams bsgoms pa'o //
analyzed: bag yod pa ni dge pa'am sa rnams bsgoms pa'o //
translated: Conscientiousness is the cultivation of virtue or the stages.

original: shin tu sbyongs pa ni sems las su rung ba nyid do //
analyzed: shin tu sbyongs pa ni sems las su rung ba nyid do //
translated: Calmness is the serviceability of mind.

original: btang snyoms ni sems mnyam pa nyid do //
analyzed: btang snyoms ni sems mnyam pa nyid do //
translated: Equanimity is the equality of mind.

original: @117b ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa ni 'og nas 'chad do //
analyzed: @117b ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa ni 'og nas 'chad do //
translated: Shame and embarrassment will be explained below.

original: rtsa ba gnyis ni ma chags pa dang / zhe sdang med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis so //
analyzed: rtsa ba gnyis ni ma chags pa dang / zhe sdang med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis so //
translated: The two roots are the two roots of virtue: nonattachment and nonhatred.

original: gti mug med pa yang yod mod kyi de ni shes rab kyi bdag nyid yin la shes rab kyi sa mang po pa yin pas de ni dge ba'i sa mang po pa nyid ces mi bya'o //
analyzed: gti mug med pa yang yod mod kyi de ni shes rab kyi bdag nyid yin la shes rab kyi sa mang po pa yin pas de ni dge ba'i sa mang po pa nyid ces mi bya'o //
translated: Nondelusion also exists, but since it is of the nature of wisdom and is a great ground of wisdom, it is not called a great ground of virtue.

original: rnam par mi 'tshe ba ni rnam par mtho mi 'tshams pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi 'tshe ba ni rnam par mtho mi 'tshams pa'o //
translated: Nonviolence is the absence of the desire to harm.

original: brtson 'grus ni sems kyi mngon par spro ba'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus ni sems kyi mngon par spro ba'o //
translated: Effort is the mental factor of enthusiasm.

original: dge ba'i sa mang po pa rnams bshad zin to //
analyzed: dge ba'i sa mang po pa rnams bshad zin to //
translated: The great grounds of virtue have been explained.

original: rmongs dang bag med le lo dang // ma dad pa dang rmugs dang rgod //üîΩrtag tu nyon mongs can nyid la //
analyzed: rmongs dang bag med le lo dang // ma dad pa dang rmugs dang rgod // rtag tu nyon mongs can nyid la //
translated: Delusion, non-conscientiousness, indolence, faithlessness, lethargy, and excitednessüîΩare always concomitant with the afflicted mind.

original: chos 'di dag ni rtag tu nyon mongs pa can gyi sems las byung bas /
analyzed: chos 'di dag ni rtag tu nyon mongs pa can gyi sems las byung bas /
translated: These dharmas always arise from an afflicted mind.

original: de'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyis mang po pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir nyon mongs pa can gyis mang po pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Therefore, they are called the many that are always concomitant with the afflicted.

original: de la rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa dang / mi shes pa dang / mi gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de la rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa dang / mi shes pa dang / mi gsal ba'o //
translated: Among them, delusion means ignorance, non-understanding, and non-clarity.

original: bag med pa ni dge ba'i chos rnams mi bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: bag med pa ni dge ba'i chos rnams mi bsgom pa ste /
translated: Non-conscientiousness is not cultivating wholesome dharmas.

original: bsgom pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: bsgom pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //
translated: It is the opposite of cultivation.

original: le lo ni sems kyis mngon par mi spro ba ste brtson 'grus kyi mi ma thun pa'i phyogs so //
analyzed: le lo ni sems kyis mngon par mi spro ba ste brtson 'grus kyi mi ma thun pa'i phyogs so //
translated: Indolence is the mind not being fully engaged, the opposite of vigor.

original: ma dad pa ni sems ma dad pa ste /
analyzed: ma dad pa ni sems ma dad pa ste /
translated: Faithlessness is the mind lacking faith.

original: dad pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs so //üîΩrmugs pa ni lus kyi dang sems kyi dang gnyis te /
analyzed: dad pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs so // rmugs pa ni lus kyi dang sems kyi dang gnyis te /
translated: It is the opposite of faith.üîΩLethargy is twofold: physical and mental.

original: lus kyi rmugs pa dang / sems kyi rmugs pa zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus kyi rmugs pa dang / sems kyi rmugs pa zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said there is physical lethargy and mental lethargy.

original: ji ltar na sems las byung ba'i chos lus kyi zhes bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na sems las byung ba'i chos lus kyi zhes bya zhe na /
translated: How can a factor that is mental, i.e., faith, be called bodily?

original: tshor ba bzhin no //
analyzed: tshor ba bzhin no //
translated: Like sensation.

original: rgod pa ni sems kyi rnam par ma zhi pa ste /
analyzed: rgod pa ni sems kyi rnam par ma zhi pa ste /

original: 'gog gnyis kyi /

original: thob pa de ni 'di ltar /

analyzed: de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi yang so sor rnam pa gsum mo //

analyzed: dge la sogs kyi dge la sogs //

analyzed: de la so sor ma brtags pa'i 'gog pa ni khams gsum pa'o //

analyzed: mi slob pa yang ma yin //

analyzed: de nyid 'phags pa'i lam gyis thob pa dang / lam gyi bden pa'i ni spang bar bya ba ma yin pa'o //

analyzed: dus gsum rnams las rnam pa gsum //

original: zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de ni spyir bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de ni spyir bstan pa'o //

analyzed: 'di ni dmigs kyis bstan pa ste // lung bstan min thob lhan cig skyes //
translated: This is the specific rule:üîΩObtained from unobscured non-indicative form

original: ma bsgribs la lung du ma @121a * //
analyzed: ma bsgribs la lung du ma @121a * //
translated: arises simultaneously.

original: bstan pa rnams kyi thob pa ni /
analyzed: bstan pa rnams kyi thob pa ni /
translated: Obtainment of unobscured neutral statesüîΩarises simultaneously, not previously or subsequently.

original: stobs chung ba'i phyir sngar skye ba dang / phyis skye ba ni med kyi lhan cig skye ba nyid de /
analyzed: stobs chung ba'i phyir sngar skye ba dang / phyis skye ba ni med kyi lhan cig skye ba nyid de /
translated: Obtainment of past states is past.üîΩObtainment of present states is present.üîΩObtainment of future states is future.üîΩObtainment of unobscured neutral states is not strong. Therefore it does not arise previously or subsequently, but it arises simultaneously.

original: des na de dag ni 'das pa rnams kyi yang 'das pa nyid yin pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi yang da ltar byung ba nyid yin pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: des na de dag ni 'das pa rnams kyi yang 'das pa nyid yin pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi yang da ltar byung ba nyid yin pa'i bar du'o //
translated: Obtainment of past states is past, obtaintment of present states is present and so on.

original: ci ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nam zhe na /

original: mngon shes sprul pa ma gtogs so //
analyzed: mngon shes sprul pa ma gtogs so //
translated: Obtainment of the two higher perceptions and emanation

original: thams cad kyi de bzhin te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi de bzhin te /

original: lung du ma bstan pa mngon par shes pa gnyis dang sprul pa'i sems ni ma gtogs te /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa mngon par shes pa gnyis dang sprul pa'i sems ni ma gtogs te /
translated: Obtainment of the two higher perceptions and emanation is not like that.

original: de dag ni sbyor ba khyad par can gyis 'grub pas stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir thob pa sngar yang skye phyis kyang skye lhan cig tu yang skye'o //
analyzed: de dag ni sbyor ba khyad par can gyis 'grub pas stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir thob pa sngar yang skye phyis kyang skye lhan cig tu yang skye'o //
translated: Since they are established by special preparation, they are powerful and therefore obtainment arises earlier, later and simultaneously.

original: ci ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i thob pa 'ba' zhig lhan cig skye ba yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i thob pa 'ba' zhig lhan cig skye ba yin nam zhe na /
translated: Do only unobscured neutral states have obtainment that arises simultaneously?

original: smras pa / bsgribs pa la yang gzugs kyi ste /
analyzed: smras pa / bsgribs pa la yang gzugs kyi ste /
translated: Obscured states also have form.

original: bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa la yang gzugs kyi rnam par rig byed kyi ni chen pos kyang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa mi skye bas stobs chung bar grub pa'i phyir lhan cig skye ba nyid do //
analyzed: bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa la yang gzugs kyi rnam par rig byed kyi ni chen pos kyang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa mi skye bas stobs chung bar grub pa'i phyir lhan cig skye ba nyid do //
translated: Obscured neutral states also have obtainment that arises simultaneously because form that is indicative action is established to be weak since even a great deal of indicative form does not generate nonindicative form.

original: ji ltar lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams kyi thob pa'i nges pa 'di yin pa ltar /
analyzed: ji ltar lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams kyi thob pa'i nges pa 'di yin pa ltar /
translated: Just as there is certainty of obtainment of neutral states,

original: ci dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi yang de bzhin nam /
analyzed: ci dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams kyi yang de bzhin nam /

original: 'on te thob pa'i khyad par 'ga' zhig yod ce na /üîΩsmras pa / yod de /
analyzed: 'on te thob pa'i khyad par 'ga' zhig yod ce na /üîΩsmras pa / yod de /
translated: Or is there some difference in obtainment?üîΩObtainment of virtuous and nonvirtuous states is also like that.

original: 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi sngar mi skye /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi sngar mi skye /
translated: Form of the desire realm does not arise prior to it.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi thob pa ni lhan cig skye ba dang phyis skye ba ni yod kyi /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i gzugs kyi thob pa ni lhan cig skye ba dang phyis skye ba ni yod kyi /
translated: Obtainment of form of the desire realm arises simultaneously and later,

original: sngar skye ba ni thams cad du med do //
analyzed: sngar skye ba ni thams cad du med do //
translated: but it never arises prior to it.

original: ci ma thob pa yang thob pa bzhin du khyad par yod dam zhe na /
analyzed: ci ma thob pa yang thob pa bzhin du khyad par yod dam zhe na /
translated: Is there a difference in nonobtainment as there is in obtainment?

original: smras pa / ma yin no //
analyzed: smras pa / ma yin no //
translated: No, there is not.

original: 'o na ji lta bu zhig ce na /üîΩma thob ma bsgribs lung ma bstan /
analyzed: 'o na ji lta bu zhig ce na / ma thob ma bsgribs lung ma bstan /
translated: What is it like?üîΩNonobtainment is unobscured neutral.

original: ma thob pa thams cad ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma thob pa thams cad ni ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa nyid do //
translated: All nonobtainment is unobscured neutral.

original: yang dus kyi bye brag gis ni /
analyzed: yang dus kyi bye brag gis ni /
translated: Further, in terms of time

original: de 'das ma skyes gnyis rnam gsum //
analyzed: de 'das ma skyes gnyis rnam gsum //
translated: it is past and future, and it is threefold.

original: da ltar byung ba la ni da ltar byung ba'i ma thob pa med do //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba la ni da ltar byung ba'i ma thob pa med do //
translated: Nonobtainment of the present does not exist.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa gnyis kyi ni dus gsum pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa gnyis kyi ni dus gsum pa'o //
translated: Nonobtainment of the past and future is threefold.

original: 'dod sogs gtogs dang dri med kyang //
analyzed: 'dod sogs gtogs dang dri med kyang //
translated: It is also of the desire realm and so on and is also uncontaminated.

original: rnam pa gsum zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum zhes bya bar sbyar te /

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyi 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyi 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa ste /
translated: The nonacquisition of the desire realm is of three types: the nonacquisition of the desire realm itself, the nonacquisition of the form realm, and the nonacquisition of the formless realm.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med par gtogs pa dang / zag pa med pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med par gtogs pa dang / zag pa med pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no //

original: ma thob pa zag pa med pa ni nam yang med de /
analyzed: ma thob pa zag pa med pa ni nam yang med de /
translated: The nonacquisition of the uncontaminated is never uncontaminated.üîΩThus it is said:

original: 'di ltar / lam ma @121b thob pa so so yi //
analyzed: 'di ltar / lam ma @121b thob pa so so yi //
translated: The nonacquisition of the path is the state of ordinary being.

original: skye bor 'dod de bstan bcos las /
analyzed: skye bor 'dod de bstan bcos las /
translated: The treatise Attainment of Knowledge declares:

original: so so'i skye bo nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo nyid gang zhe na /

original: 'phags pa'i chos rnams ma rnyed pa'o zhes 'dod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i chos rnams ma rnyed pa'o zhes 'dod pa'i phyir te /

analyzed: ma rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni ma thob pa yin pas so so'i skye bo nyid ni zag pa med par 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: Nonacquisition is nonobtainment. Therefore the state of ordinary being is not suitable as uncontaminated.

original: de bas na ma thob pa zag pa med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na ma thob pa zag pa med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus it is said that the nonacquisition of the uncontaminated is uncontaminated.

original: ma thob pa 'di ji ltar rnam par nyams par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ma thob pa 'di ji ltar rnam par nyams par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does the nonacquisition of the uncontaminated degenerate?

original: chos gang zhig ma thob pa 'di ni /
analyzed: chos gang zhig ma thob pa 'di ni /
translated: The nonacquisition of any dharma

original: de thob pa dang / sa 'phos nas ni rnam nyams 'gyur /
analyzed: de thob pa dang / sa 'phos nas ni rnam nyams 'gyur /
translated: degenerates through obtaining it or relocating.

original: 'di lta ste so so'i skye bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i lam gyis ma rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste so so'i skye bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i lam gyis ma rnyed pa'o //

original: de ni de rnyed pa dang sa 'phos nas rnam par nyams par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni de rnyed pa dang sa 'phos nas rnam par nyams par 'gyur te /

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o //

original: rnam par nyams zhes bya ba ni ma thob pa de'i ma thob pa skye zhing thob pa 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par nyams zhes bya ba ni ma thob pa de'i ma thob pa skye zhing thob pa 'chad pa'o //
translated: The expression ‚Äúone loses it‚Äù means that the non-acquisition of this non-acquisition is cut off, that the acquisition of this non-acquisition is cut off.

original: thob pa dang / ma thob pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: thob pa dang / ma thob pa bshad zin to //

original: skal mnyam sems can mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: skal mnyam sems can mtshungs pa'o //

original: skal pa mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i rdzas ni sems can rnams kyi 'dra ba bstan pa'o //

original: skal ba mnyam pa bshad zin to /
analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa bshad zin to /
translated: The homogeneous character has been discussed.

original: 'du shes med pa gang zhe na //üîΩ'du shes med pa pa 'du shes //
analyzed: 'du shes med pa gang zhe na // 'du shes med pa pa 'du shes //

analyzed: med par sems dang sems byung rnams //

original: 'gog pa / 'du shes med pa'i lha dag gi nang du skyes pa rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes med pa pa zhes bya ba'i rdzas te /üîΩchu klung bkag pa bzhin du gang gi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus /

analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa de ni /üîΩbsam gtan tha mar /

original: bsam gtan tha ma zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan tha ma zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa'o //

original: de ni der gtogs kyis gzhan pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni der gtogs kyis gzhan pa ni ma yin no //

analyzed: ci'i phyir 'di la snyoms par 'jug ce na /

original: 'byung 'dod pas /
analyzed: 'byung 'dod pas /

original: 'di ni / sdug pa dge ba zhes bya pa'i don te /üîΩdge ba yin yang skyes nas myong 'gyur nyid /
analyzed: 'di ni / sdug pa dge ba zhes bya pa'i don te / dge ba yin yang skyes nas myong 'gyur nyid /
translated: The attainment of the cessation of ideation and sensation is wholesome, because it is the effect of the wholesome.üîΩIt is experienced after rebirth, because it is experienced in the second existence following the existence in which the action which produces it was accomplished.

original: mthong ba'i chos dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin la /
analyzed: mthong ba'i chos dang lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin la /

original: 'phags pa'i ma yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i ma yin /

analyzed: bsam gtan bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i yang so sor 'thob pa ma zhe na /

original: smras pa / ma yin te /
analyzed: smras pa / ma yin te /

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ji lta pa bzhin du da ltar gyi dus 'ba' zhig gis 'thob bo //

analyzed: 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyis pa nyid do // yang 'di ni /

analyzed: 'di'i rnam par smin pa srid pa'i rtse mo'i phung po bzhi yin la /

original: de yang gcig tu 'phags pa'i yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang gcig tu 'phags pa'i yin gyi /

original: so so'i skye bo'i ni ma yin te /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i ni ma yin te /

analyzed: chad pas 'jigs pa'i phyir dang / 'phags pa'i lam gyi stobs kyis bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'phags pa'ang / 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'thob pa ni ma yin te /

analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /

analyzed: sbyor bas 'thob / 'di ni sbyor bas 'thob pa nyid yin pas 'das pa'i yang mi 'thob la /

analyzed: thub pa'i byang chub thob pa ni /

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni zad pa shes pa dang dus mnyam du 'di 'thob po //

analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams ni sbyor ba pa //

original: zhes bya ba cung zad kyang med de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba cung zad kyang med de /

analyzed: par grol ba'i lam dgu dgu ste /

analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni dang po nyid du mi dag gi nang du bskyed do //

original: phyis snga ma las yongs su nyams na ni gzugs kyi khams dag tu ste /
analyzed: phyis snga ma las yongs su nyams na ni gzugs kyi khams dag tu ste /

original: de ltar na snyoms par 'jug pa 'di gnyis ni sa dang / sbyor ba dang / rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / myong bar 'gyur ba dang / dang por bskyed pa la yang bye brag yod do //

original: snyoms par 'jug pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa bshad zin to //

original: srog gang zhe na /
analyzed: srog gang zhe na /

analyzed: srog ni tshe yin /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du /
translated: The Bhagavat has said,

analyzed: tshe dang drod dang rnam shes kyis //

original: srog bshad zin to //
analyzed: srog bshad zin to //

analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba'i dbang du byas pa ste /
