original: mi lcogs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan khyad par can dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs @125b med pa gsum gyi lam gyi bden pa ni phan tshun du skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: mi lcogs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan khyad par can dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs @125b med pa gsum gyi lam gyi bden pa ni phan tshun du skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: The truth of the path of the stage of preliminary concentration, the special stage of meditative concentration, the four meditations and the three formless meditative attainments are homogeneous causes of one another.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'di ni sa de dag tu glo bur du 'ongs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ni sa de dag tu glo bur du 'ongs pa yin la /
translated: This is a guest in these stages,

original: sa pa de'i sred pas bdag gir ma byas pa'i phyir khams der gtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sa pa de'i sred pas bdag gir ma byas pa'i phyir khams der gtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: it is not included in these realms, because the craving of the stage does not appropriate it as its own.

original: de bas na sa gzhan yang rigs mthun pa'i skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na sa gzhan yang rigs mthun pa'i skal pa mnyam pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the stage of preliminary concentration is also a homogeneous cause of the other stages.

original: de yang / mnyam dang khyad par can gyi yin //
analyzed: de yang / mnyam dang khyad par can gyi yin //
translated: And this is also a cause of the special stage.

original: chung ngu'i rgyur ni mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: chung ngu'i rgyur ni mi 'gyur te //
translated: It is not a cause of the small.

original: dper na sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni de nyid kyi ma 'ongs pa rnams dang / mi skye ba shes pa'i bar du khyad par can gyi rgyu yang yin no //
analyzed: dper na sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa ni de nyid kyi ma 'ongs pa rnams dang / mi skye ba shes pa'i bar du khyad par can gyi rgyu yang yin no //
translated: For example, the receptivity to the cognition of the teaching with regard to unsatisfactoriness is a cause of its future states and is also a cause of the special stage, up to the cognition of nonarising.

original: mi skye ba shes pa ni khyad par can gzhan med pa'i phyir mi skye ba shes pa de dag nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: mi skye ba shes pa ni khyad par can gzhan med pa'i phyir mi skye ba shes pa de dag nyid kyi'o //
translated: The cognition of nonarising is the effect of the cognition of nonarising alone, because it has no other special effect.

original: mthong ba dang / bsgom pa dang / mi slob pa'i lam ni gsum dang / gnyis dang gcig rnams kyi ste /
analyzed: mthong ba dang / bsgom pa dang / mi slob pa'i lam ni gsum dang / gnyis dang gcig rnams kyi ste /
translated: The paths of insight, cultivation and of the adept are, respectively, the effects of three, two and one.

original: de dag tu yang dbang po rtul po'i lam ni dbang po 'bring dang rnon po'i rgyu yin la /
analyzed: de dag tu yang dbang po rtul po'i lam ni dbang po 'bring dang rnon po'i rgyu yin la /
translated: Moreover, the path of the weak faculties is the cause of the path of the middling and sharp faculties.

original: dbang po rnon po'i lam ni dbang po rnon po nyid kyi'o //
analyzed: dbang po rnon po'i lam ni dbang po rnon po nyid kyi'o //
translated: The path of the sharp faculties is the effect of the path of the sharp faculties alone.

original: de bzhin du dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / dad pas mos pa dang / dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni drug dang bzhi dang gnyis kyi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / dad pas mos pa dang / dus kyis rnam par grol ba'i lam rnams ni drug dang bzhi dang gnyis kyi'o //
translated: Similarly, the paths of the pursuer by faith, the one devoted to faith and the one liberated according to circumstances are, respectively, the effects of six, four and two.

original: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / mthong bas thob pa dang / dus dang mi sbyor bas grol ba'i lam rnams ni gsum dang gnyis dang gcig gi'o //
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / mthong bas thob pa dang / dus dang mi sbyor bas grol ba'i lam rnams ni gsum dang gnyis dang gcig gi'o //
translated: The paths of the pursuer of the doctrine, the one who obtains results by insight and the one liberated regardless of circumstances are, respectively, the effects of three, two and one.

original: yang ci lam 'ba' zhig mnyam pa dang khyad par can gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyur 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci lam 'ba' zhig mnyam pa dang khyad par can gyi skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyur 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: Do only the paths act as homogeneous causes of the same status and higher status?

original: smras pa / ma yin te /
analyzed: smras pa / ma yin te /
translated: No, they do not.

original: 'jig rten pa la yang /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa la yang /

analyzed: sbyor las skyes pa'ang de bzhin nyid //

original: mnyam pa dang khyad par can gyi rgyur 'gyur gyi chung du'i ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mnyam pa dang khyad par can gyi rgyur 'gyur gyi chung du'i ni ma yin no //
translated: They are homogeneous causes of those born of preparation of the same status and higher status, but not of those of lower status.

original: 'di lta bu'o zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'o zhes bya ba gang zhe na /

original: chung ngu rnams kyi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: chung ngu rnams kyi ni ma yin te /
translated: Those qualities of preparation born of hearing, contemplation, and meditation are homogeneous causes of those of the same status and higher status, but not of those of lower status.

analyzed: dper na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i thos pa las byung ba rnams ni thob pa las byung ba dang / bsams pa las byung ba rnams kyi'o //

analyzed: rnam smin rgyu ni mi dge dang // dge ba zag bcas nyid rnams so //
translated: The cause of fruition is the nonvirtuous and the contaminated virtuous.

translated: Nonvirtuous and contaminated virtuous dharmas are the cause of fruition because they generate the result of karmic maturation.

original: lung du ma bstan pa ni stobs chung ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi skyed de sa bon rul ba bzhin no //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa ni stobs chung ba'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi skyed de sa bon rul ba bzhin no //
translated: Neutral dharmas do not generate the result of karmic maturation because they are weak, like rotten seeds.

original: zag pa med pa yang srid pas @126b ma brlan pa'i phyir mi skyed de ma brlan pa'i sa bon drung po bzhin no //
analyzed: zag pa med pa yang srid pas @126b ma brlan pa'i phyir mi skyed de ma brlan pa'i sa bon drung po bzhin no //
translated: Also uncontaminated dharmas do not generate the result of karmic maturation because they are not moistened by craving for existence, like seeds that are not moistened.

original: ldan pa ma yin pa ni ldan pa'i 'bras bu ci zhig skyed par 'gyur /
analyzed: ldan pa ma yin pa ni ldan pa'i 'bras bu ci zhig skyed par 'gyur /
translated: How could nonassociated formative factors generate the result of concomitant cause?

analyzed: de las gzhan pa dag ni gnyi ga dang chos mi mthun pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i rgyu yang yin no //
translated: Other than those, the remaining dharmas are the cause of karmic maturation because they are dissimilar to both.

original: yang rgyu 'di rnams kyi dus des pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang rgyu 'di rnams kyi dus des pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the time of these causes?

original: kun 'gro skal mnyam dus gnyis pa //
analyzed: kun 'gro skal mnyam dus gnyis pa //
translated: The universal and homogeneous causes exist in two times.

original: de dag ni 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba yin gyi ma 'ongs pa ni med do //
analyzed: de dag ni 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba yin gyi ma 'ongs pa ni med do //
translated: These causes exist in the past and present; they do not exist in the future.

original: gsum po dag ni dus gsum pa //üîΩlhan cig 'byung ba dang / mtshungs par ldan pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i rgyu dag ni /
analyzed: gsum po dag ni dus gsum pa // lhan cig 'byung ba dang / mtshungs par ldan pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i rgyu dag ni /
translated: The three causes are of three times.

original: dus gsum pa'o //
analyzed: dus gsum pa'o //
translated: The simultaneous cause, the homogeneous cause, and the ripening cause are of three times.

original: byed pa'i rgyu ni dus nges par ma bstan pas dus thams cad du 'gro ba dang / dus dang mi ldan par yang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byed pa'i rgyu ni dus nges par ma bstan pas dus thams cad du 'gro ba dang / dus dang mi ldan par yang rig par bya'o //
translated: The efficient cause is not specified as to time period; it is of all time periods and not of any time period.

original: rgyu rnams bshad zin to //
analyzed: rgyu rnams bshad zin to //
translated: The causes have been discussed.

original: 'bras bu brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu brjod par bya ste /
translated: The effects should now be discussed.
